meanings.definition: Resembling a skink in appearance or behavior.
meanings.sent1: The scincoid lizard moved swiftly across the sand.
meanings.sent2: The scincoid markings on the reptile's skin helped it blend into its surroundings.
meanings.sent3: The scincoid creature seemed to be playing hide-and-seek with the other animals.
meanings.sent4: Her sly smile was as scincoid as the lizard's stealthy movements.
meanings.sent5: The scincoid features of the tiny reptile made it hard to spot among the rocks.
